eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: Chongyue defeats Ya and makes a stand for Yumen, in his way, then gives the sword to Huai Tianpei. They agree to fight again in forty years. The damage that Yumen has taken will need two months to repair. Ya learns new information and sets out.

attributes.content: The second long journey through the vast void.
Awakening at the end of the journeyâ€”
Regret. Shame. Anger. Disorientation.
But even more so, confusion.
You want me to stay? Then answer my question for It!
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: I came so far to find you.
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Did you know that those ants have dug through mountains and filled in rivers, calling the scars they leave upon the land 'cities?'
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Is this frail and sick land still the cosmos that we had once lived and frolicked in?
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Did you know that the marks They left before They died remain on this despicable city they call Yumen?
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: The ants have not repaired it for a thousand years, calling it part of the glorious journey towards civilization.
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: This is the city that your fragment has sworn to protect?
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: It is It. I am I.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: (Heaven's repressed anger)
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: The boat continues to sail.
The plants on the banks grow shorter, pressed down by the snow.
Do you remember how our consciousnesses journeyed the sleepless void and became the first living beings here?
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Do you remember how we watched the sun rise and set, giving order to time and objects, and Heaven and earth took shape?
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Do you remember that eye which broke the heavens? We watched and clashed in the cosmos, the rivers turned red, the mountains leveled, the bodies piled up until they reached the clouds, becoming new mountains when they rotted away...
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Such a magnificent thing a true war is!
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: (Heaven's repressed anger)
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: The boat continues to sail upon a river without end.
The snow grows thick. Each question echoes like an avalanche.
It is white up above and down below. The skies are so low that one only has to reach out to touch them.
Why would one who has seen such an era care about the ants between its claws, and the dust that they stir up?
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: To deceive humanity, you meddled with cloud and rain, sent preposterous 'blessings' from the heavens, helped the so-called True Lung triumph. How utterly meaningless...
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Why do you answer them again after a thousand years? Harass, provoke, hunt and kill your own kind?!
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Compared to their ancestors, puny but brave, these ants are feeble, despicable, filthy. Why do you want to rule over them?!
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Why do you want to become their god?!
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: (Heaven's repressed anger)
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Since time immemorial, has our kind ever seen the shame that you have put yourself to?!
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Answer me, my... my kin!
You're angry.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: In all these millennia of slumber, It has ever been like you are now...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Swallowing the shame, chewing upon betrayal, seeking answers.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: That is why fragments like us were born.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: But we are not It.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I cannot answer your question.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I cannot understand your fury, just as you cannot understand mine.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Fury?
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: You will stand for humanity? Here?
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Draw the sword, and maybe you can.
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: I'm thinking how much you treasure this dimension.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Born in spring, prosper in summer, wilt in autumn, fade away in winter. Cut away the seasons, and hold it at one's bosom.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I could imagine how you hurriedly cut away this little pocket and took it with you when you fled Yan a thousand years ago.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: How you hid in a remote corner of the world, flipping through the pages again and again, licking your wounds before a snippet that will never fade.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Since when have the Feranmuts become so sentimental?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: How is it different from those feeble, despicable and filthy humans you speak of?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Eight thousand years of spring, eight thousand years of autumn. The snow never stops falling. This little corner will ever be itself.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: This is how you measure time...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: How silly.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Days, months, years.
Winter turns to spring, then to winter again.
Time can be divided, no matter how long.
One mind, one will, one move. From equinox to solstice, to the next equinox.
Humanity has always been so, breaking down life into tiny constituents, and perceiving everything within those constituents.
The boat stops.
A firm fist connects with Ya's chest.
There is no extraneous motion, only the utmost simplicity.
The ice and snow melt into a single point on the river. Ya falls from the boat...
And hits the cold, hard ground.
This is what you learned after you forsook Its power...
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: You are not It...
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: The man does not speak. He watches the 'human' before him, in its last throes.
All the living things of the world do not look so different on the brink of death.
Why... haven't you killed me?
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: No point. You can reshape your proxy's body at will.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Leave Yumen.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: We'll meet again.
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Sir, the initial damage report is in.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Casualties?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: All civilians on the east side were safely evacuated to the west side.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Half of the Imperial Astronomical Bureau Casters deployed at the inner city to deal with the secondary storm were injured. Also on scene were Mr. Lin of Lungmen and his daughter, Envoy Lin... Mr. Lin suffered serious injuries.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: H-He is being treated at the army hospital.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: All of Yumen owes Mr. Lin a great debt. Spare neither money nor manpower.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Damage to buildings?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The west side was unaffected. A number of buildings were damaged by the storm in the east and north sides.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: The east side took the brunt of the storm.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Two of the Four Guardians were damaged beyond economical repair and have been detached by the Tianshi.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Part of the foundation wall has been severely warped. Emergency repairs are in progress.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: About 60% of all city defenses have been damaged.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: The Tianshis' assessment?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Initial estimates are that it will take at least two months before Yumen can move again, even with full effort devoted to the repairs.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Two months...
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Slightly better than pre-Catastrophe estimates.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Here are my orders.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The entire army will remain alert for potential after-storms.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Continue to assess damage and treat the injured. Erect emergency shelters to house the evacuated population.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: And the Shanhaizhong?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: They attempted to cause chaos by attacking city defenses and harassing the people. Most have been brought to justice by the Patrol Battalion's prompt intervention, assisted by civilian volunteers.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Only a few managed to escape through gaps in the damaged walls.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: ...I see.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: However, we have not found the Shanhaizhong leader responsible for the assassination attempt at the barracks. Search efforts are underway.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: She did not show herself?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Strange, given her ability...
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: What of the Grandmaster?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The Grandmaster visited the Sword Forge. He has not been seen since.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Why did you give me this sword?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I want you to keep it safe... consider it a request.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: So this was the sword that all the fuss was about.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: What is it, anyway?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: It is too many things.
An artifact holding one of the twelve fragments of the Sui, witness to a relationship of love and hate, an old antique sword.
A keepsake for our next fight.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Just don't let anyone steal it again, or pawn it for money.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Sounds important.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Well, if it's too much trouble...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I'm just thinking... we don't really know each other that well.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I know your name is Huai Tianpei. You have two wise friends, and a talented daughter.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: And you are the only one who has ever gotten the upper hand on me, even once.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I know you're the only one I couldn't beat, in my forty years of training.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I'll take the sword.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I'll find you after I've trained for another forty years.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I'll be waiting.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Excuse me, doctor.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: How much does the man who worked at your clinic owe you? I'll pay it.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Nah, he worked that off ages ago.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: It was just a convenient excuse to take him in.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Better for him to be in here mending people's bones, than out there breaking them.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Thank you... for everything.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Are you his daughter?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Just found it hard to believe he had a daughter so polite and well-mannered. No offense, of course.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Still, it takes some getting used to, not having him around.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: How am I going to clean up all this sand by myself?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I-I'll help!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Left without a word? Again?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Some men never change.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm not so anxious to find him this time around, though.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Looks like you've made your own plans.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I have my job at the agency, and school. And kung fu, of course.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: He'll get more than just a kick in the chin the next time I see him.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Orders from above. We have our next mission. We'll go once we've rested and recovered.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Too bad Yumen survived the Catastrophe, while we took heavy casualties.
attributes.name: Restless Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: (Sneers)
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: The letter burns in the masked man's hand, quickly turning to ash, making a tiny corner of gold even more conspicuous.
Paint from a special seal that only top imperial mandarins may use. Only five people have access to it.
The man rubs the seal in his hand, crushing it into tiny pieces that fade into the sand.
Our mission was to cause a commotion that would catch the imperial court's attention. We still have a use for Yumen. It will not do to lose it.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: We move now.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: We're not waiting for Master? We could hardly have done this without her.
attributes.name: Restless Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: It's the Di beast... Master is back!
attributes.name: Restless Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Careful...
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Who in Yumen could have injured you like this?!
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: A 'Man.'
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: What else did you hear?
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: (Eerie roar)
attributes.name: Di Beast

attributes.content: How long?
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: (Eerie roar)
attributes.name: Di Beast

attributes.content: Two months?
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: ...That's enough.
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: I know where It is.
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: What do you... what are you...?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Master, I'm afraid we must part here.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Suit yourself.
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: Just don't get in my way.
attributes.name: Ya

attributes.content: There is always an end to the path, no matter how long.
I have felt it since my awakening, growing ever clearer. What they call 'Mortality.'
The wounds from that hunt will never fully heal.
I hope you have awakened.
I have little time left. I have few kin left.
Let us settle this.
